page.title: 12TOURISM - LOCAL RESORTS
page.content: Musselburgh is situated on the A1 road and is therefore strategically placed. Tourists have easy access to both Edinburgh and other East Lothian towns.There are many tourist attractions in Musselburgh,Longniddry, Aberlady,Gullane,North Berwick,and Dunbar.There are historic castles,museums, golf courses, and nnature trails. There are plenty of caravan and camping sites. Boats run from North Berwick to the Bass Rock which has a huge gannet colony and is a haven for herring gulls,kittiwakes, puffins,fulmars and guillemots. Musselburgh has a recreational centre for sailing and water-skiing enthusiasts.
